## Registration 

Early registration: 190 €. Deadline 17th April 2026.  

Late registration: 285 €. From 17th April 2026.

The registration fee includes meeting attendance and documentation, as well as lunches, the poster party, and coffee-breaks.

# Symposium 

Networking in prion research (Friday 21:00): 65 €. Anyone wishing to attend the Symposium on Friday, May 23rd, must check the appropriate box on the Registration Form and add 65 € to the deposit.

We have reserved a private hall in a prestigious restaurant for an evening of social networking and brainstorming, where we will enjoy the company of fellow prion researchers and lay the groundwork for future research lines inspired by the scientific advances presented throughout the congress.
